Text: HNoMS "Vidar" (N52) was a Royal Norwegian Navy minelayer and command vessel.

Triplets:<HNoMS Vidar
1:

<Text: HNoMS Vidar (N52):  "Vidar" was built by Mjellem & Karlsen in Bergen in 1977, and named after Odin's son Vidar from Norse mythology.>
Triplets:<HNoMS Vidar

<Text: HNoMS Vidar (N52):  The Lithuanian Navy uses her as a command and support ship.>
